DOC.brief_summary: A matched pair cluster-randomized trial intervention package conduct four rural indigenous district ( Huehuetenango , Quiche , Alta Verapaz San Marcos ) Republic Guatemala , use health clinic unit randomization . No external intervention plan control facility , although enhanced monitoring , surveillance data collection occur throughout study facility four district . The package include 3 intervention : 1 ) To train health care professional emergency obstetric perinatal care use innovative high-fidelity , low-tech , situ , multidisciplinary simulation training curriculum ( PRONTO ) ; 2 ) To design implement social marketing strategy promote institution-based delivery ; 3 ) To integrate role obstetric nurse professional midwife intervention community act liaison traditional birth attendant ( TBA ) public health unit . A fourth , cross-cutting component involve ongoing analysis , monitoring , surveillance evaluation strengthen information system monitor perinatal outcome throughout two year study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Measure Effectiveness Intervention Package Aiming Decrease Perinatal Mortality Increase Institution-based Obstetric Care Among Indigenous Populations Guatemala
DOC.detailed_description: Overall goal To evaluate impact package three intervention aim increase institution-based delivery improve emergency obstetric neonatal care perinatal mortality , four district high maternal mortality ratio Guatemala . Specific objectives - Measure impact intervention package perinatal mortality rate . - Measure impact intervention package proportion institution-based delivery among study facility . - Evaluate process success implementing combine package intervention analyze process indicator relate intervention element design improve emergency obstetric neonatal care ( PRONTO : emergency obstetric perinatal training program ) . Primary outcome interest : 1 . Increase proportion institutional delivery intervention vs. control cluster . 2 . Decrease perinatal death rate intervention vrs control clinic
